author: travelgirl
title: @blocktrades贊助的世界杯比賽已經進入8強階段！ | 有機會贏 2000 SBD 獎池！
body:
###
世界杯16強剛剛完成，我們已經進入8強的比賽
https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png
你們而知道，@blocktrades喜歡贊助這種類型的社區參與項目，而@anomadsoul＆@acidyo知道很多Steemians都喜歡看世界杯，所以他們決定組織這個巨大的足球世界杯賽事。
第一階段之後，我們有超過1800 有效的參賽者，這次 @blocktrades比賽的分數非常接近，沒有人遙遙領先，每個人都有機會可以贏這個比賽，特別是考慮到淘汰賽階段 我們會讓大家猜每場的正確比分 讓大家可以獲得更多比賽得分.
###
為了繼續參加這個比賽，你必須在接下來的4場比賽中挑選出每場的勝出國家。你要猜每一場的分數. 你猜的分數是在球賽90分鐘結束時的分數， 加時等等之後的分數我們不會計的:
###
Uruguay vs France
###
Brazil vs Belgium
###
Sweden vs England
###
Russia vs Croatia
##
你必須使用以下這個格式來發帖。記住團隊名稱必須是英文否則Blocktrade 不會接受的。我們建議大家複製以下我們提供的格式發布你的帖子，只需要加上你的預測分數可以。你猜的分數是在球賽90分鐘結束時的分數， 加時等等之後的分數我們不會計的.
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score \-|-|-|-|- \- | Uruguay | vs | France | - \- | Brazil | vs | Belgium | - \- | Sweden | vs | England |- \- | Russia | vs | Croatia | - ###
你可以直接複製和粘貼上面這個格式到 steemit.com 或 busy.org 上就可以讓帖子變成以下這樣的
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- - | Uruguay | vs | France | - - | Brazil | vs | Belgium | - - | Sweden | vs | England |- - | Russia | vs | Croatia | - ###
規則
1 - 你的帖子的標題必須是：The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals 2 - 在你的文章中，你必須包含原本的 @blocktrades世界杯英文帖子. 你可以在[這裏](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)找到 3 - 請使用這股帖子上面的格式，讓我們可以清楚跟進每一個帖子 4 - 請使用這兩個標籤 “blocktradesworldcup” 和 “mypicks” 5 - 請轉發[原本的英文帖子](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool). 我們想更多人可以參加！ 6 - 發帖子之後就不可以編輯任何東西。所以發布之前仔細考慮你的選擇。 7 - 這次的活動只讓聲望40以上的用戶參加。這是因為想避免機器人來參加這次的活動 8 - 請在2018年7月6日UTC時區 16:59 pm (UTC+3) 前作出你的選擇. 如果你不知道那個時區，可以到 [這裡](https://www.timeanddate.com/time/map/)查看 ##
得分
###
這次的比賽你必須包括每場預測的分數。猜對每場的正確的分數，你會得到三（3）分。如果你只猜對那隊贏但沒有猜對正確的分數，你會有 一分（1分）。
如果你沒有參加小組賽或 16 強的比賽，**你就沒有資格參加今次的比賽**
祝大家好運，預測現在開始！
請在2018年7月6日UTC時區 16:59 pm (UTC+3) 前作出你的選擇
這次比賽是又@blocktrades贊助, 如果你喜歡他們在 Steemit社區做的事情, 請投 @blocktrades 作為[見證人](https://steemit.com/~witnesses) 這次的活動是又 @acidyo & @anomadsoul 舉辦, 如果你喜歡他們在 Steemit社區做的事情, 請投 @ocd-witness 作為[見證人](https://steemit.com/~witnesses) ---

body:
### The last 16 stage finished and now waiting the matches for the round of Quarter Finals. *** ![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmeRtJXVe8EZ8insMtNkRjMvfmkEeiKEPdM4R6WJ3Sg96j)[Image Source](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool) *** 6 Countries Eliminated in Round of 16 World Cup 2018. Unfortunately, but that's the name of the game. Russia is able to create history by qualifying for the quarterfinals world cup 2018. Wowww so happy. 6 countries that were eliminated among others: Argentina, Spanish, Portugal, Denmark, Japan and Mexico. The most exciting and fierce quarter final match is expected to take place in Kazan. Maybe Brazil will definitely get away after dropping Mexico. then Belgium has to do an epic comeback to get rid of Asia's only representative in the fall phase. This is really fun . Already we that know @blocktrades really like to sponsor events that involve the community. And also @anomadsoul & @acidyo know much Steemians likes this game. It's a really big contest prize .. if you want to get involved. author: lizanomadsoul
title: Es geht weiter mit dem Viertelfinale! - Postet jetzt eure Tipps, um weiterhin um den 2.000 SBD Preispool zu kämpfen!
body:
###
Das Achtelfinale ist seit gestern beendet und alle Begegnungen des Viertelfinales stehen fest
https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png
Da @blocktrades sehr gerne diese Art von gemeinschaftsfördernden Projekten unterstützt und @acidyo und @anomadsoul wissen, dass sehr viele Steemians dieses Spiel mit Emotion verfolgen, haben sie beschlossen, dieses gigantisches Weltmeisterschafts-Event auf die Beine zu stellen.
Es gab mehr als 1.800 gültige Beiträge und es ist ein Kopf an Kopf rennen, niemand ist weit voraus und jeder kann noch gewinnen, vor allem wenn man bedenkt, dass __für die Ko-Runde das richtige Endergebnis berücksichtigt wird__, damit die Teilnehmer pro Spiel mehr Punkte sammeln können.
###
Um weiter mitzumachen, müsst ihr in einem Post euren Tipp für die Gewinner der nächsten 4 Spiele abgeben. Dieses Mal müsst ihr auch die Tore, die eurer Meinung nach in diesen 4 Spielen innerhalb der ersten 90 Minuten fallen angeben:
###
France vs Uruguay
###
Brazil vs Belgium
###
Sweden vs England
###
Russia vs Croatia
##
BENUTZT DIESE VORLAGE FÜR EUREN POST. VERGESST NICHT, DASS DIE TEAMNAMEN AUF ENGLISCH AUFGELISTET SEIN MÜSSEN. ICH EMPFEHLE EUCH DIE UNTENSTEHENDE TABELLE ZU KOPIEREN UND IN EUREM POST EINZUFÜGEN. DANN MÜSST IHR NUR NOCH EURE TIPPS EINTRAGEN. DER ENDSTAND MUSS DER, DER REGULÄREN SPIELZEIT (90min) SEIN, ALSO SIND AUCH UNENTSCHIEDEN MÖGLICH.

REGELN
1 - Der Titel eures Beitrags muss wie folgt lauten: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals 2 - Dein Beitrag muss einen Link zu diesem Originalbeitrag: [LINK](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/the-knockout-stage-is-on-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool) enthalten. 3 - Benutzt das selbe Format wie in obigem Beispiel, damit wir die Teilnahmen gut organisiert sammeln können. 4 - Verwendet die Tags "blocktradesworldcup" und "mypicks". 5 - Teilt (Resteem) diesen Originalbeitrag: [LINK](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool). Wir wollen so viele Teilnahmen wie möglich. 6 - Nachdem ihr den Beitrag verfasst habt, könnt ihr eure Tipps nicht mehr ändern. Überlegt also bitte gut, bevor ihr den Beitrag veröffentlicht. 7 - Die Mindestreputation zur Teilnahme ist 40, um die Teilnahme von Bots und zweiten Profilen zu erschweren. Wir wollen sicher gehen, dass die Gewinner AKTIV und ECHTE STEEMER sind. 8 - Die Teilnahme ist bis zum 06.07.2018, um 16:59 pm, Zeitzone UTC+3 möglich. Falls ihr nicht wisst in welcher Zeitzone ihr feststeckt, könnt ihr [hier](https://www.timeanddate.com/time/map/) nachsehen, wieviel Zeit euch bleibt. ##
Punkteschlüssel
###
In dieser Runde ist es wichtig die Toranzahl in euren Tipp miteinzubeziehen. Für jeden richtigen Endstand bekommt man drei (3) Punkte. Falls man nur den Gewinner richtig getippt hat erhält man einen (1) Punkt.
Wer bei der Gruppenphase und dem Achtelfinale nicht mitgemacht hat KANN LEIDER NICHT MEHR MITTIPPEN.
Ich wünsche euch viel Glück und Erfolg - Lasst das Tippspiel beginnen!
##
Die Teilnahme ist bis zum 06.07.2018, um 16:59 pm, Zeitzone UTC+3 fällig!!!.
Dieses Tippspiel wird von @blocktrades gesponsert. Wenn euch gefällt, was er tut, votet [hier](https://steemit.com/~witnesses) für @blocktrades als Witness. Dieses Tippspiel wird von @acidyo & @anomadsoul organisiert. Wenn euch gefällt, was die beiden machen, votet [hier](https://steemit.com/~witnesses) für @ocd-witness als Witness.
## Hinweise zur Übersetzung _Dieser Beitrag ist eine Übersetzung der englischsprachigen Originalankündigung: [Quarter finals stage - Submit your entry to keep competing for the 2,000 SBD prize pool](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool) - bitte bei Verlinkung/Resteem diesen als Bezug nehmen!_ _Ausserdem __muss__ die Teilnahme aus organisatorischen Gründen auf englisch erfolgen - dies sollte mit dem verlinkten Beispielpost und dieser deutschen Anleitung jedoch kein Problem sein denke ich ;)_ _Ich hoffe die Übersetzung war so weit verständlich und ihr wisst genau was ihr tun müsst, um beim Wettkampf um 2.000 SBD mitzumachen. Solltet ihr trotzdem noch Fragen haben, könnt ihr mir diese natürlich gerne auch hier auf deutsch stellen!_ _Natürlich werde ich weiterhin für euch @worldcup-russia 's Spielanalyse auf deutsch übersetzen!_ _Ich weiß Deutschland ist schon ausgeschieden, und ich bin auch sehr traurig darüber! - Aber um so mehr bin ich dafür, dass wir alles geben, um hier zu gewinnen und diesen Pot nach Hause zu holen!!_
__In diesem Sinne Viel Glück und Erfolg an Alle!!__
__Liz__

title: Ikaapat na bahagi - Isumite ang iyong artikulo para lumahok sa 2,000 SBD na premyo
body:
###
Natapos na ang huling 16 na naglabalaban at alam na natin kung sino ang mgakalahok sa ikaapat na bahagi ng palaro
https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png
Si @blocktrades ay mahilig magpalaro ng mga proyektong ang layunin ay mapag isa ang komunidad at alam ni @acidyo & @anomadsoul na maraming Steemins ay mahilig sa ganitong laro, kaya naisipan namin na gawin itong napakalaking Football World cup na pagtitipon.
Nagkaroon ng 1,800 na wastong artikulo na sumali at sobrang dikit ng laban, na sa mga oras na ito ay wala pang nanalo kaya may pag asa pa manalo lalo't na knockout stage kasama ang tamang puntos sa basehan ng mananalo.
###
Para lumahok kailngan gumawa ng artikulo na pumili ng mananalo sa susunod na apat na laro. Kailangan mo ilagay ang magiging puntos na mangyayari sa apat na laban sa regular na oras (unang 90 na minuto):
###
Uruguay vs France
###
Brazil vs Belgium
###
Sweden vs England
###
Russia vs Croatia
##
KAILANGAN GAMITIN ANG TEMPLATE NA ITO PAG GUMAWA KA NG ARTIKULO. TANDAAN NA NG MGA PANGALAN NG MGA KUPONAN AY NASA WIKANG ENGLISH. NIRERECOMMENDA NAMIN NA GAYAHIN LANG ANG SUMUSUNOD NA TALA SA PAGGAWA NG IYONG ARTIKULO, ILAGAY LANG ANG PUNTOS NA HULA MO. ANG PUNTOS NA ILALAGAY AY YUN LAMANG SA 90 NA MINUTO NA REGULAR NA LARO, SO PWEDE NA MAY TABLA.

ANG MGA PATAKARAN
1 - Ang titulo ng iyong artikulo at dapat: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals 2 -Ang iyong artikulo ay dapat may pasabi sa orihinal na anunsyo na [ito](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool) 3 - Gamitin ang ayos dito sa artikulo na ito para maayos namin na mailista ang iyong kalahok.. 4 - Gamitin ang tags na "blocktradesworldcup" at ang tag na "mypicks" 5 - Resteem ang artikulong ito. Kailangan makita ng lahat ang artikulong ito para mas walang maiawan at hindi makasali. 6 - Hindi mo na pwede baguhan ang artikulo mo matapos magsimula ang unang laban. 7 - Kailangan na ang pinakamababang reputasyon ay 40 para sumali. Para maiwasan ang mga bots na sumali at titingnan namin ang mga nanalo ay MGA ACTIBO AT TOTOONG STEEMIANS. 8 - Pwede magsumite ng artikulo hanggang ika anim ng Hulyo, 2018 sa 16:59 ng gabi, UTC+3 Time zone. Kung hindi mo alam ang oras na ito ay maaring tingan [dito](https://www.timeanddate.com/time/map/) ##
Pag Puntos
###
Kailangan ilagay ang puntos sa iyong mga hula. Para sa bawat tamang puntos na tama ikaw ay magkakaroon ng tatlong (3) puntos. Kung tama ang hula mo na manalo pero hindi tama ang puntos ikaw ay magkakaroon ng isang (1) puntos.
Kung hindi ka sumali sa group stage at knockout stage HINDI KA PWEDE SUMALI SA SAKLAW NA ITO.
Pagpalain sana lahat at umpisahan na ang paghula sa mga mananalo!

author: muhammadrizki96
title: Tahap perempat final - Kirim entri Anda untuk tetap ersaing untuk 2.000 hadiah hadiah SBD
body:
### Babak 16 terakhir telah selesai beberapa menit yang lalu dan kami sudah tahu pertandingan untuk putaran perempat final ###
![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/football-3344911_960_720.png) Seperti yang telah kita ketahui, @blocktrades suka mensponsori proyek keterlibatan komunitas jenis ini dan @anomadsoul & @acidyo tahu banyak Steemian yang menyukai permainan ini, jadi mereka memutuskan untuk menyelenggarakan acara Piala Dunia Sepakbola yang sangat besar ini.

Lebih dari 1.800 entri yang valid dan kompetisi sangat dekat, tidak ada yang jauh di depan dan semua orang masih bisa menang, terutama mengingat bahwa untuk babak sistem gugur kami akan mempertimbangkan skor yang benar sehingga orang dapat memperoleh lebih banyak poin per pertandingan.

### Untuk berpartisipasi, Anda harus membuat posting memilih setiap pemenang dari 4 pertandingan berikutnya. Anda harus memasukkan skor yang Anda pikir akan terjadi pada 4 game ini dalam waktu Reguler (hanya 90 menit pertama): ###
### Uruguay vs France ### ### Brazil vs Belgium ### ### Sweden vs England ### ### Russia vs Croatia ###
### KALIAN HARUS MENGGUNAKAN TEMPLATE BERIKUTNYA UNTUK MEMBUAT POSTING ANDA. INGATNYA NAMA TIM HARUS DALAM BAHASA INGGRIS. MEREKA MENGHALANGKAN MENYALINKAN DAN MEMBERSIHKAN TABLE BERIKUTNYA UNTUK MEMBUAT POSTING ANDA, HANYA TERMASUK SKOR PREDIKSI ANDA. SKOR HARUS DIPERTIMBANGKAN SAAT SELASA 90 MENIT, SEHARUSNYA DAPAT DICINTAI. ###
Salin code ini

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- - | Uruguay | vs | France | - - | Brazil | vs | Belgium | - - | Sweden | vs | England |- - | Russia | vs | Croatia | -

### Salin tabel di atas dan tempelkan pada steemit.com atau editor post busy.org kalian.Tabel akan nampak seperti dibawah ini: ###
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- - | Uruguay | vs | France | - - | Brazil | vs | Belgium | - - | Sweden | vs | England |- - | Russia | vs | Croatia | -
### PERATURAN ###
1 - Judul postingan Anda harus:: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals 2 - Dalam postingan kalian, kalian harus menyertakan tautan ke postingan di bawah ini. https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool 3 -Gunakan TEMPLATE dan format yang telah tersedia 4 - Gunakan tag blocktradesworldcup dan tag mypicks 5 - Resteem postingan dibawah ini https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool 6 - Setelah anda membuat posting, anda tidak dapat mengeditnya. Jadi tolong pikirkan pilihan anda dengan seksama sebelum memposting. 7 - Reputasi Minimum untuk berpartisipasi adalah 40. Hal ini untuk menghindari bot bergabung. 8 - Kalian dapat mengirimkan entri hingga 6th 2018 at 16:59 pm, Zona Waktu UTC+3 . Jika Kalian ingin mengkonversi, coba check pada link [ini](https://www.timeanddate.com/time/map/).
### Penilaian ### ### Kalian harus memasukkan skor untuk prediksi ini. Untuk setiap skor yang benar, kalian akan mendapatkan tiga (3) poin. Jika kalian hanya benar dalam menebak pemenangnya tetapi skornya salah, kalian akan diberikan satu (1) poin. ###
Jika anda tidak bergabung dalam babak penyisihan grup dan babak sistem gugur, kalian TIDAK BISA BERGABUNG DALAM BABAK INI. Selamat mencoba dan Semoga Menang!
### INGAT! Kalian dapat mengirimkan entri hingga 6th Juli 2018 pukul 16:59,Zona waktu UTC +3. ###

author: anomadsoul
title: Cuartos de Final - Haz tu post para seguir concursando por 2,000 SBD en premios
body:
###
La etapa de grupos terminó hace unas horas y ya tenemos los juegos de octavos de final
https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png
Como ya sabes, a @blocktrades le encanta patrocinar este tipo de eventos que unen a la comunidad y yo @anomadsoul y @acidyo sabemos que a muchos Steemians les gusta este deporte, así que decidimos organizar este enorme evento de la copa del mundo.
En la etapa de grupos tuvimos más de 1,800 entradas válidas y la competencia está muy cerrada, no hay nadie que se haya despegado del grupo y cualquiera puede ganar todavía, en especial considerando que en la etapa de octavos de final tomaremos en cuenta el marcador correcto para que la gente pueda ganar más puntos por juego.
###
Para seguir participando en la copa, debes hacer un post eligiendo un ganador para cad uno de los siguientes 4 juegos. Debes incluir el marcador que piensas tendrá cada uno de estos juegos EN TIEMPO REGULAR, o sea contando solamente los 90 minutos:
###
Uruguay vs France
###
Brazil vs Belgium
###
Sweden vs England
###
Russia vs Croatia
##
DEBES USAR EL TEMPLATE QUE INCLUYO UN POCO MÁS ABAJO PARA HACER TU POST. LOS NOMBRES DE LOS EQUIPOS DEBEN SER EN INGLES. TE RECOMIENDO QUE COPIES Y PEGUES LA TABLA DE ABAJO PARA HACER TU POST, SOLO INCLUYE TUS PREDICCIONES. LOS MARCADORES DEBEN SER CONSIDERADOS DENTRO DEL TIEMPO REGLAMENTARIO DE 90 MINUTOS SIN TIEMPO EXTRA NI PENALES.
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score \-|-|-|-|- \- | Uruguay | vs | France | - \- | Brazil | vs | Belgium | - \- | Sweden | vs | England |- \- | Russia | vs | Croatia | - ###
Copia la tabal de arriba y pegala en tu editor de steemit.com o busy.org y la tabla se mostrará de la siguiente manera:
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- - | Uruguay | vs | France | - - | Brazil | vs | Belgium | - - | Sweden | vs | England |- - | Russia | vs | Croatia | -
Recuerda, los nombres de los equipos deben ser EN INGLES. ###
Reglas
1 - El título de tu posts debe ser: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter Finals 2 -En tu post, incluye un link al anuncio original en ingles en el perfil de @worldcup-russia. [Este es el link](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool). 3 - Usa el formato incluido en este post para hacer tu tabla de predicciones. 4 - Usa los tags "blocktradesworldcup" y "mypicks" 5 - Da Resteem al [post original en inglés](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool). 6 - Una vez que hagas tu post ya no puede ser editado. 7 - Reputación mínima de 40. Queremos gente real participando y no bots, el equipo de @worldcup-russia se encargará de revisar que cualquier ganador sea un STEEMIAN REAL Y ACTIVO. 8 - Puedes realizar tu post de entrada hasta el 6 de Julio a las 16:59 pm, UTC+3 zona horaria. Si no sabes que zona horaria es esa [revisa aquí](https://www.timeanddate.com/time/map/) ##
Puntajes
###
Tienes que incluir el marcador en tiempo regular para estas predicciones. Si predices bien el marcador, obtendrás tres (3) puntos. Si solo predices bien el ganador o si fue empate, entonces recibirás un (1) punto.
Si no te uniste para la etapa de grupos ni octavos de final lo siento, ya no puedes participar.
Buena suerte a todos y que las predicciones comiencen!!
##
Puedes meter tu entrada hasta el 6 de julio de 2018 a las 16:59 pm, UTC+3 zona horaria
Esta es una inciativa patrocinada por @blocktrades, si te gusta lo que hace por la comunidad, vota por @blocktrades como testigo [aquí](https://steemit.com/~witnesses) Esta copa es organizada por @anomadsoul y @acidyo, si te gusta lo que hacen por la comunidad, vota por @ocd-witness como testigo [aquí](https://steemit.com/~witnesses)

title: 2018 World Cup - COLOMBIA vs ENGLISH
body:
[![Thumbnail](https://images.dlive.io/c4d58316-7f9e-11e8-ba94-0242ac110002)](https://dlive.io/video/muhammadrizki96/28c22d00-7f9c-11e8-bbe8-435b8d3c86e8)

The midfielder who played for Bayern Munich looked nervous when Harry Kane opened England's lead at Otkrytiye Arena on Wednesday (4/7) early morning but then watched as Yerry Mina equalized the score to impose extra-time stints.

The match continued through the tos-tosan match after both teams played equally for an additional 30 minutes, with Colombia briefly in the air following Jordan Henderson's failure to execute a 12-fitting kick.

However, Colombia must finally go home because Matues Uribe's shot hit the bar while Carlos Bacca's effort could be damped by goalkeeper Jordan Pickford.

England secured a breakthrough in the quarter-finals after Eric Dier's penalty was prevented by goalkeeper David Ospina, and James's defeat with a cries on the bench and not to reveal his crushed feelings through his personal Twitter account.

author: superoo7
title: [Analysis] Blocktrades worldcup contest Round of 16 #mypicks analysis on choices made
body:
#### Repository
https://github.com/superoo7/worldcup

#### Introduction

In my [previous post](https://steemit.com/utopian-io/@superoo7/analysis-blocktrades-worldcup-contest-mypicks-analysis-on-choices-made) I shared about the analysis of the group stage of world cup competition prediction hosted by @blocktrades. In this analysis, will be the follow-up competition for Round of 16 predictions.

![](https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmc9YKRK9wNg5K9FTkSRjZK5M5naEE9rcwopQ4gY7EXvHv/image.png)

The analysis extraction program is hosted on github which is a forked version of the previous analysis. https://github.com/superoo7/worldcup-2

#### Outline
- Scope
- Summary
- Data Extraction
- Data Visualization
- Possible errors
- Conclusion
- Tools and Scripts
- Relevant Links and Resources

#### Scope

The data is extracted from SteemSQL on 3/7/2018, where the timeframe for the analysis is between 2018-06-28 20:26:03 (GMT +0) and 2018-06-30 13:59:00 (GMT +0). The first timestamp is when the post is made, whereas the second timestamp is the deadline given on the post.

### Result

#### Summary

There are a total of 1351 posts which fulfill the previous timeframe, but the finalize data is 1226 posts only. This means that there are 9.25% of invalid entries from all the participants which could be due to post without following the format, violation of participation rule, post that used both #blocktradesworldcup and #mypicks but not meant for entry of the competition.

Here are some rules that are considered in this analysis:

- Last edit and created should be before 2018-06-30 13:59:00 (GMT +0)
- Use of both tags #blocktradesworldcup and #mypicks
- Only submission in English for the choices made (e.g. Spain instead of Espanyol)
- Follow the markdown table templates given
- Reputation > 35

#### Data Extraction

The data extraction process is as followed:

* Check reputation of the authors.
* Extract out data by using string replacement and regex
* Check whether an author make multiple posts
* Stored data in both JSON and CSV format

There are 1351 posts extracted from SteemSQL

**Check reputation of the authors**

![Screen Shot 2018-07-05 at 10.45.08 AM.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmUuk6SvVEvEu5v1L8CuFyVf4NJwdmJ6WszXVWxhWJWivj)

In this section of filtering, there are 63 authors that violated the rule of a minimum reputation of 35. 

**Extract out data from the post body**

![Screen Shot 2018-07-05 at 10.47.01 AM.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmUV6h5Su4zKDqekfop1JtrzLpqPKhpN4UwLTLLJHtteFJ)

In this section, there are 54 posts that violated this section. This could be caused by the post used both tags but not intend to participate in the competition, invalid table format, post entry that does not use English and etc.

**Check whether an author make multiple posts**

![Screen Shot 2018-07-05 at 10.49.01 AM.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmRDaTJh5gyWHnEoFdD1Lskn22CDHJat8sz8UhhfuXFiPb)

In this section of filtering, there are 4 authors, a total of 12 posts violated the rule of submitting duplicate entries.

<hr>

After the filter, there are 1226 posts left, with a 9.25% of violated post rate from all the post extracted.

#### Data Visualize

By using Tableau, a tool for doing data visualization, I am able to share a few plotted out data.

**Choices made**

![wc2.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmeSCrbb7297gmhVoFJHdavyZkdAVFGmZCGUxDqi4rnLmB)

This is the choices made by the participants on the goal score between both teams at 90 minutes full-time mark.

**Win, Lose or Tie based on choices made**

![wc2-1.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/Qmdr52WVRMMHMh8e4tUfkQYrAZsoS55yfn3Axrj61aErM3)

> The green color indicates the LHS as the winner, the blue color indicates a draw, red color indicates LHS as the loser and RHS as the winner, and orange indicates invalid data.

Based on the data previously made, I further investigate on which team are more favorable in terms of winning instead of goal scores. 

**Final Score result**

Since the Round of 16 is over, these are the result of goal scores and condition.

![Screen Shot 2018-07-05 at 11.06.47 AM.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmfDFPnb5y6hTh4wdDP2tBF9DuG4DthN29QcnBNwDd3LgX)

|Match|Score|Condition|
|:---:|:---:|:---:|
|France vs Argentina|4:3|w|
|Uruguay vs Portugal|2:1|w|
|Spain vs Russia|1:1|t|
|Croatia vs Denmark|1:1|t|
|Brazil vs Mexico|2:0|w|
|Belgium vs Japan|3:2|w|
|Sweden vs Switzerland|1:0|w|
|Colombia vs England|1:1|t|

#### Possible errors

* The script also only accept the country being sorted in the order given in the template.
* The script is able to extract only markdown table and most of the HTML table. Without using the markdown table given, the script is not able to extract out the data.

#### Conclusion

I am glad that I was again being assigned to carry out the task of making analysis for this competition.


If you interested in joining, there is another round going on by @worldcup-russia: https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool

#### Tools and Scripts

* SteemSQL (MSSQL) - Extracting data of all the posts
* TypeScript - To run data extraction with Regex and string replacement
* Jest - To test individual functions created for data extraction
* Tableau - Data visualize tools

#### Relevant Links and Resources

* SQL Query

```
SELECT
  'https://steemit.com' + Comments.url AS link,
  Comments.author,
  Comments.title,
  Comments.created,
  Comments.last_update,
  Comments.body,
  Accounts.reputation
FROM
  Comments
LEFT JOIN Accounts ON Comments.author = Accounts.name
WHERE
  depth = 0 AND
  Comments.created > '2018-06-28 20:26:03' AND
  Comments.created < '2018-06-30 13:59:00' AND
  Comments.last_update < '2018-06-30 13:59:00' AND
  CONTAINS(Comments.json_metadata, 'blocktradesworldcup') AND
  CONTAINS(Comments.json_metadata, 'mypicks')
```

#### Proof of Authorship
https://github.com/superoo7/worldcup-2

author: santarius
title: Ćwierćfinał Blocktrades World Cup! - Prześlij swoje zgłoszenie, aby móc dalej rywalizować o 2000 SBD!
body:
###
Znamy już mecze, jakie odbywały się będą w ćwierćfinale Mistrzostw Świata, czas kontynuować więc naszą grę!
https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png
Jak już dobrze wiecie, @blocktrades uwielbia sponsorować tego typu, angażujące całą społeczność projekty, a @anomadsoul i @acidyo dobrze wiedzą, jak wielu Steemian uwielbia piłkę nożną. To właśnie dlatego zdecydowali się oni zorganizować to wielkie i niezwykłe wydarzenie.
W poprzednim etapie nadesłanych zostało 1800 ważnymi zgłoszeń. Rywalizacja jest niezwykle zacięta, lecz wciąż każdy ma szansę na wygraną, zważywszy na fakt, że teraz, w fazie pucharowej, zadaniem uczestników konkursu będzie nie tylko obstawić która drużyna wygra, ale również podać dokładny wynik każdego meczu! W ten sposób uczestnicy, mogli będą zdobyć znacznie więcej punktów, niż w poprzedniej fazie i tym samym nawet dogonić aktualną czołówkę.
###
Aby wziąć udział w zabawie, musisz obstawić wynik, każdego z tych czterech spotkań. Wynik ten musi uwzględniać jedynie pierwsze, regulaminowe 90 minut meczu (mogą więc występować remisy):
###
Uruguay vs France
###
Brazil vs Belgium
###
Sweden vs England
###
Russia vs Croatia
##
ABY STWORZYĆ STWORZYĆ POST, POWINIENEŚ UŻYĆ PREZENTOWANEGO PONIŻEJ SZABLONU. PAMIĘTAJ, ŻE NAZWY DRUŻYN MUSZĄ BYĆ W JĘZYKU ANGIELSKIM. ZALECAMY SKOPIOWANIE I WKLEJENIE TEJ TABELI, A NASTĘPNIE WPROWADZENIE PRZEWIDYWANYCH PRZEZ SIEBIE WYNIKÓW. KAŻDY OBSTAWIANY PRZEZ CIEBIE WYNIK POWINIEN UWZGLĘDNIAĆ JEDYNIE REGULAMINOWE 90 MINUT MECZU, CO OZNACZA, ŻE DOPUSZCZALNE SĄ REMISY.
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score \-|-|-|-|- \- | Uruguay | vs | France | - \- | Brazil | vs | Belgium | - \- | Sweden | vs | England |- \- | Russia | vs | Croatia | - ###
Skopiuj powyższą tabelę i wklej ją w edytorze steemit.com, bądź busy.org. Tabela powinna wyświetlić się w sposób następujący:
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- - | Uruguay | vs | France | - - | Brazil | vs | Belgium | - - | Sweden | vs | England |- - | Russia | vs | Croatia | - ###
ZASADY:
1 - Tytuł twojego posta musi brzmieć: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals 2 - W twoim zgłoszeniu musi zostać zawarty link do tego ogłoszenia 3 - Użyj szablonu podanego w tym poście 4 - Użyj tagów `blocktradesworldcup` oraz `mypicks` 5 - Resteemuj ten post - chcemy, by każdy mógł go zobaczyć. 6 - Po utworzeniu postu nie można go edytować. Dokładnie przemyśl więc swoje typy przed publikacją. 7 - Uczestnik musi posiadać minimum 40 reputacji - uniknąć chce się udziału botów, ponadto każdy zwycięzca zostanie ręcznie sprawdzony, by upewnić się, że jest człowiekiem i jest aktywny na Steemit. 8 - Zgłoszenia można nadsyłać do 6 lipca 2018 r. do godziny 15:59 **czasu polskiego**. ##
Punktacja
###
Za każdy prawidłowy wynik otrzymasz trzy (3) punkty. Jeśli uda Ci się określić jedynie kto wygrał, jednak nie obstawisz właściwego wyniku, otrzymasz jeden (1) punkt.
Jeśli nie brałeś udziału w fazie grupowej i fazie pucharowej konkursu, NIE MOŻESZ DOŁĄCZYĆ DO TEGO RUNDY.
Powodzenia wszystkim, można już nadsyłać zgłoszenia!
##

body:
https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png

The Last 16 round is over and the quarter finals start in a few hours, you still have time to [submit your entry for this round](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool).

The Last 16 round came with some surprises and some expected scores, here are the results of the 8 games for this round IN REGULAR TIME:

author: wr212
title: World Cup 2018: Danilo Injury, Absent Bela Brazil Fight Belgium
body:
<center>![671808_720.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmbY4jum6j1Ld7Mvr3XCBexPjeqntppnxQiM2XprcJfr7N/671808_720.jpg)</center>
The Brazilian right-back Danilo certainly could not keep up with the rest of the 2018 World Cup competition after he suffered an ankle ligament injury while training on the eve of the quarter-final against Belgium, the Brazilian Football Confederation (CBF) said in a statement.
The 26-year-old suffered thigh problems as Brazil underwent Group E's opening game against Switzerland and was replaced by Fagner. Danilo himself entered the team after Dani Alves withdrew from the squad before the final round due to injury.

<center>![Untitled-2-169.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmPD5PNkJZR8pxSZkK1R4YwcfKDnapSiR4GrnMQkJ5Q99X/Untitled-2-169.jpg)</center>

CBF said on its official website that the Manchester City player's scan confirmed a ligament injury in his left ankle, forcing him to continue his work in Russia.

<center>![images.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmPvniTD4CRUEVQMhPpY21BHD9rayoqdsqdfERFnBiB1yS/images.jpg)</center>

Danilo has been asked to remain in the squad and has started treatment for injuries, added CBF.

<center>![715115_720.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYtvPzHagt3NfUUtaUCEViJF3sMZEmv8GXeRZttAnN76Q/715115_720.jpg)</center>

Brazil, which is the favorite team to lift the 2018 World Cup for the sixth time. After appearing less convincing in Group E allowance, Brazil able to advance to the round of 16 large. In the last 16, the Samba team won 2-0 over Mexico.

<center>![716120_720.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWoZA5PxXiGTmRYr9vpfcEaxNSch79WNMnmbDvtR2Y3WJ/716120_720.jpg)</center>

You Have To Use The Next Template To Make Your Post. Remember The Team Names Must Be In English. We Reccomend Copying And Pasting The Next Table To Make Your Post, Just Include Your Prediction Scores. The Score Must Be Considered When The 90 Minutes End, So There Can Be Ties.

<center>![11.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdwVw6ZYe4vcaTEfH9t3e4saSYdZ388xo3AwoGJw3hnyB/11.jpg)</center>

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
2 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 1

<center>![12.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRS6CjAD9a4BLUavZs6wb7bce6qpFcJh2Fp7JScxzDxcv/12.png)</center>
